DOC.HEADLINE: NATION IN BRIEF ; FLORIDA ; ASTRONAUTS LOCATE MISSING MOSQUITO
DOC.TEXT: The Great Mosquito Hunt aboard space shuttle Endeavour is over . The insect was sucked into the filter of a fan and squashed , astronauts reported to the Kennedy Space Center.They had been looking_for the intruder since first spotting it after they arrived in orbit Friday . The insect interlude did not interfere with the mission of the shuttle ' s powerful radar system to examine the Earth ' s surface . The radar scanned more volcanoes , including Sicily ' s Mt . Etna and Hawaii ' s Kilauea .
